metadata.title: CVE-2016-2559 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the format function inlibraries/sql-parser/src/Utils/Error.php in the SQL parser in phpMyAdmin4.5.x before 4.5.5.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitraryweb script or HTML via a crafted query.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
